text: Edison Bariano Lobão (born December 5, 1936) is a Brazilian politician.UN: The Secretary-General's High-Level Group on Sustainable Energy For All: Edison Lobão (accessed 12 December 2015) He was governor of Maranhão from March 15, 1991 to April 2, 1994 and as minister of mines and energy in the national government under the Dilma Rousseff administration. He has also been a senator since 1987. He was the President of the Senate in 2001. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1936 births Category:Presidents of the Federal Senate Category:Politicians from Maranhão
title: Edison Lobão
